document.full_text: brain scans of healthy people showed signs that the brain was shrinking in alzheimer's-affected areas nearly a decade before the disease was diagnosed, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
document.title: brain shrinks a decade before alzheimer's appears
lines_and_colors: brain scans of healthy people showed signs that the brain was shrinking in alzheimer's-affected areas nearly a decade before the disease was diagnosed, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
